Generate DOT language scripts for NMF models

Source: R/nmfkc.R
nmfkc.DOT.Rd

nmfkc.DOT generates scripts in the DOT language for visualizing the NMF model structure (\(Y \approx X C A\)) or its simplified forms.

Usage

nmfkc.DOT(
  x,
  type = c("YX", "YA", "YXA"),
  digits = 2,
  threshold = 10^(-digits),
  rankdir = "LR",
  Y.label = NULL,
  X.label = NULL,
  A.label = NULL,
  Y.title = "Observation (Y)",
  X.title = "Basis (X)",
  A.title = "Covariates (A)",
  min.penwidth = 1,
  max.penwidth = 5
)

Arguments

x

The return value of nmfkc.

type

Character string specifying the visualization type. Options are:

  • "YX" (Default): Standard NMF view: \(B \to X \to Y\).

  • "YXA" : Full visualization of the tri-factorization \(A \to C \to X \to Y\).

  • "YA": Direct regression view: \(A \to Y\), where coefficients are from \(X C\).

digits

Integer. Number of decimal places to display in edge labels. Default is 2.

threshold

Numeric. Parameters greater than or equal to this threshold are displayed. Default is \(10^{-\code{digits}}\).

rankdir

Graph layout direction in DOT language. Default is "LR".

Y.label

Character vector for row names of Y/X (features). If NULL, uses rownames(x$X).

X.label

Character vector for column names of X/rows of B (latent factors). If NULL, uses colnames(x$X).

A.label

Character vector for row names of A/columns of C (covariates). If NULL, uses colnames(x$C).

Y.title

Title for the Y node cluster. Default is "Observation (Y)".

X.title

Title for the X node cluster. Default is "Basis (X)".

A.title

Title for the A node cluster. Default is "Covariates (A)".

min.penwidth

Numeric. Minimum line thickness for the path (default: 1.0).

max.penwidth

Numeric. Maximum line thickness for the path (default: 5.0).

Value

A character string containing a DOT script, suitable for use with the DOT package or Graphviz tools.

See also

nmfkc
